Curved line 12: Draw a curved line with a radius of 0.0354 starting at 0.0, 0.0354 and ending at 0.0, 0.7146 on the Y-axis. This sketch forms a single loop with 12 curves - 11 line segments and 1 curved line. The loop is closed and does not have any circles or arcs. The shape of the loop is rectangular with a curved top edge, as specified in the description. Now, scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. The part has a length of 0.75, a width of 0.75, and a height of 0.0354. Note that the operation for integrating this part with preceding CAD models is a "NewBodyFeatureOperation", indicating that it results in the creation of a new solid body. However, the specifics of the operation will be handled in the overall CAD system and are not required for these instructions. Confidence: 90%</description>
